body:
It works if I load the schema_file

    schema_file = "#{Rails.root}/db/schema.rb"
    load(schema_file)

I don't want to do this though.  What I really want to do is this.

    ActiveRecord::Migrator.prepare_migrations
    ActiveRecord::Migrator.new('up', 'db/migrate/').migrate
    ActiveRecord::Migrator.cleanup_migrations

prepare_migrations and cleanup_migrations are helper methods I added that copy all the migrations from then engines into db/migrate and then removes them. It seems that when I call 

    ActiveRecord::Migrator.new('up', 'db/migrate/').migrate

it is resetting the search_path back to public. Maybe because it is establishing a new connection?
